title: Cycling Trailblazer Lizzie Deignan to Retire After 2025 Campaign: ‘Happy to go Full Circle’
content:
After nearly two decades leading women's racing, Deignan will transition to a road captain role with Lidl-Trek in final season: 'Sometimes the basics are forgotten.'

Read the full article at Cycling Trailblazer Lizzie Deignan to Retire After 2025 Campaign: ‘Happy to go Full Circle’ on Velo.
author: ahood
